feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2022-05-18: v. 8.5 is available
entry.content: v. 8.5 is available. Added an Undo function for coding events (CTRL+Z)
entry.summary: v. 8.5 is available. Added an Undo function for coding events (CTRL+Z)

entry.title: 2022-05-13: v. 8.4 is available
entry.content: v. 8.4 is available. Added an experimental latency function and accessto BORIS ethogram repository
entry.summary: v. 8.4 is available. Added an experimental latency function and accessto BORIS ethogram repository

entry.title: 2022-05-08: v. 7.13.4 is available
entry.content: v. 7.13.4 is available. Fixed regression introduced in v. 7.13.3
entry.summary: v. 7.13.4 is available. Fixed regression introduced in v. 7.13.3

entry.title: 2022-04-28: Experimental v. 8.1.2 is available
entry.content: v. 8.1.2 is available. Added option for adding media and data files relatively to the project file path (the project will be easier to share)
entry.summary: v. 8.1.2 is available. Added option for adding media and data files relatively to the project file path (the project will be easier to share)

entry.title: 2022-04-21: Experimental v. 8.0.21 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 8.0.21 is available. Big code refactoring. Please test for regressions
entry.summary: Experimental v. 8.0.21 is available. Big code refactoring. Please test for regressions
